queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}fundhistory` ( `fundshistoryID` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userID` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` enum('initial','pending','completed','reversed','expired','refund','failed') DEFAULT 'initial', `transactionID` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `amount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `operation` enum('ADD','DEDUCT') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `type` enum('WIN','WITHDRAW','FUNDING','MAKE_BET','REFUND','CREDITS','DEPOSIT','COUPON','REFERRAL','LEAVE_CONTEST','LIVEDRAFT_TRADE_PLAYER','LIVEDRAFT_TRADE_PLAYER_REJECTED') CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `gateway` enum('PAYPAL','DFSCOIN', 'PAYSIMPLE') DEFAULT NULL, `reason` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `date` datetime NOT NULL, `leagueID` int(8) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `entry_number` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `new_balance` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `cash_to_credit` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `is_checkout` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', `site_profit` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `withdrawlID` INT(11), `balance_type_id` INT(11), `verification_code` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`fundshistoryID`), KEY `userID` (`userID`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}user_payment` ( `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `time_stamp` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `time_update` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `house` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `street` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `unit_number` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `country` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `dfscoin_wallet_address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}withdrawls` ( `withdrawlID` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userID` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reason` text, `response_message` text, `requestDate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), `processedDate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), `amount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `real_amount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `credit_to_cash` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `new_balance` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `status` enum('NEW','APPROVED','DECLINED','PENDING','SENT_EMAIL') DEFAULT 'NEW', `transactionID` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `gateway` enum('PAYPAL','DFSCOIN', 'PAYSIMPLE') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'PAYPAL', `balance_type_id` INT(11), `dfscoin_wallet_address` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`withdrawlID`) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}user_extended` ( `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `balance` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `city` varchar(100), `pay_simple_acc_id` varchar(20) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}user_teams` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `team_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `org_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}firebase_tokens` ( `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `token` varchar(255) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}vic_balance_types` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `image` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `currency_code` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `currency_position` enum('before','after') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'before', `symbol` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `info` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `ordering` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `enabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `is_core` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{PREFIX}vic_balances` ( `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `balance_type_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `balance` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00 ) ENGINE=InnoDB;

insert into `{PREFIX}vic_balance_types` (`id`, `name`, `image`, `currency_code`, `currency_position`, `symbol`, `info`, `ordering`, `enabled`, `is_core`) values('1','Default type','','USD','before','$','default balance type','1','1','1');
